name: Cheesy Chicken Casserole
description: Turn your fave hot dip appy into a satisfying, protein-packed meal while still holding onto all its cozy comfort. Serve this dish with rice or mashed potatoes to soak up all that creamy sauce.

ingredients.name: Nacho Cheese Dip Mix or CCB Dip Mix

preparation: Heat oil in Sauté Pan over medium-high heat. Add chicken; cook until golden and cooked through, about 5–6 min per side.

Reduce heat to medium. Add veggies, 1⁄2 cup cheddar, cream cheese, sour cream, and dip mix. Stir to combine (it’s OK if the cream cheese is not fully incorporated yet). Cover; cook 4 min, stirring frequently, or until cheese has melted.
Top with remaining 1⁄2 cup cheese. Cover; cook 1 min or until cheese has melted.
tips: Chicken breast fillets are ready to flip when they release easily from the pan—they should have a golden-brown sear.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1⁄2 cup cooked rice or potatoes, and 1⁄2 cup sliced veggies.

products.name: Nacho Cheese Dip Mix
summary: A delicious blend of bold chili with real Parmesan makes for a creamy nacho cheese dip or seasoning.

products.name: CCB Dip Mix
summary: Cheese. Chives. Bacon. How's that for a totally irresistible trio? Our very own smoky vegetarian bacon, made from pinto beans, is the secret star of this oh-so-yummy dip.
This blend is all about versatility and we recommend taking it way beyond the dip bowl—use CCB in any dish that could use a little levelling up.

products.name: Sauté Pan
summary: An all-purpose pan to brown, sauté, and simmer—ideal for one pan meals.
